properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NO,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT,READ_COUNT,CTGR_NM,BOARD_CD FROM BOARD JOIN CATEGORY USING(CTGR_NO) WHERE (BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR CTGR_NM LIKE '%' || ? || '%') AND BOARD_CD IN (4,5) AND BOARD_ST = 'N'

SELECT BOARD_NO,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT,READ_COUNT,CTGR_NM,BOARD_CD FROM BOARD JOIN CATEGORY USING(CTGR_NO) WHERE (BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR CTGR_NM LIKE '%' || ? || '%') AND BOARD_CD IN (5) AND BOARD_ST = 'N'

SELECT BOARD_NO,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT,READ_COUNT,CTGR_NM,BOARD_CD FROM BOARD JOIN CATEGORY USING(CTGR_NO) WHERE (BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR CTGR_NM LIKE '%' || ? || '%') AND BOARD_CD IN (4) AND BOARD_ST = 'N'

SELECT BOARD_NO,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT,READ_COUNT,CTGR_NM,BOARD_CD FROM BOARD JOIN CATEGORY USING(CTGR_NO) WHERE (BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || ? || '%' OR CTGR_NM LIKE '%' || ? || '%') AND BOARD_CD IN (4,5) AND BOARD_ST = 'N'
